contents.text:
A heart shaped shield made with ancient
Sheikah technology. Its pink energy field
glows when raised in defense, and it can
deflect a Guardian Scout's beam.

A heart shaped shield made with ancient
Sheikah technology. Its pink energy field
glows when raised in defense, and it can
deflect a Guardian Scout's beam.

The pink glowing blade of this sword was
made using ancient Sheikah technology.
Its blade appears when drawn, and its
cutting power surpasses metal swords.

The pink glowing blade of this sword was
made using ancient Sheikah technology.
Its blade appears when drawn, and its
cutting power surpasses metal swords.

But every challenge has to
have some stakes.
I'll bet you

I can beat you in
a
. You have to pay first, though!

Why don't you put down
another

I thought I'd
finally met a tough boy with some real
potential.

Now you're getting into the
spirit of things!

I'll go set things up.
Don't go anywhere!

I'm so ready
I could burst, and I bet you are too!
So let's begin...

flags on top of the 
mountain

There's only two of us, so the
race ends once someone reaches them!

You could probably
guess this already, but this is a

.
If you ride your horse or run away from
the goal instead of toward it, you'll
be

You're giving up before we
even start?

You'll never get
anywhere in life with that attitude!

Same rules as before. Whoever reaches
the goal first wins!
not the answer I hoped for...

Use all that traveling you do as a
chance to build up your leg muscles!

You got the skills to back that
confidence up?

Nothing's more dangerous than a man
who thinks he can handle the worst, only
to fall apart when the time comes.
What do you think?
prove you got the right stuff

I don't like the sound of that.
The monsters out this way are strong
critters.
You're sure you don't want to

I didn't mean to
speak out of turn.

Happy trails and
straight shooting, young man.
